__e: Just because they didn't put it in the report doesn't mean they didn't do it.
Either they did or you did and I don't want to believe it was you.
I mean, no doubt they did it or planned it and everything, so it was just a matter of why they did it, you know, and is that reasonable?
I can't believe they killed him because he wanted to change things.
Strange they'd kill him when he still owed them so much money and then leave his body in their own territory.
Could someone be deluded enough to believe they killed... even if they didn't?
I hope they took her. Then at least I'd know she'd be safe.
So who told you this one time rule? I mean... You know, something tells me not everyone's following that rule.
I know, but I had my hand on the cabinet the whole time, so I'm pretty confident there's no way they could have gotten it.
I guess Harry and his girlfriend didn't make it.
How are you sure that we-- They-- all didn't make it?
How in the hell did this happen under our noses?
I have told you a thousand times... I have no idea where they took her.
Don't you see that by coming to see her perform for taking her away from you that you could heal all of this?
After a wild night like that, hope they didn't bring you home in a paddywagon.
